FILE: cm325652v11.0.txt
DYAD: ITALY - SYRIA
RIVALRY: RIV868
DISPUTE(S): MID2856 


PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180809
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180809


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2856 

TERRMID: MID2856 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2856 3 -- uncertain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2856 from Gibler, Miller, and Little 2016, Syria fired on Italian and French war planes. No planes were hit. Coded not territory because there was no territorial dispute present, and coded uncertain because GML argue this case shold be dropped since no protest came from Italy or France. 

TERRLINK: MID2856 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2856 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2856 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2856 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2856 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2856 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2856 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES:

SOURCES:
Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
